metadata.title: CVE-2019-6462 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - low
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in cairo 1.16.0. There is an infinite loop in thefunction _arc_error_normalized in the file cairo-arc.c, related to_arc_max_angle_for_tolerance_normalized.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6462` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcairo-gobject2 - 1.18.0-3build1
libcairo-script-interpreter2 - 1.18.0-3build1
libcairo2 - 1.18.0-3build1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: cairo package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.18.0-3build1').
